descriptionHtml:

[/size][color=#00ff00][size=4]

LAKEVIEW MANOR WITH FORTIFIED WALLS.   [/size][/color]             


 [color=#00ff00][size=4]AIXOP  [/size][/color][size=3] is Lakeview Manor with fortified walls and only one way in, a pool plus some other features, the manor does 
[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3]                 not come with this mod you will still need to complete the quest,the two farm houses are cosmetic but i may at 
[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3]                 some point make them usable.
[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3]I have tested the navmesh with a follower and encountered no problems.


[/size][color=#ff7700][size=4]Requirements: Dawnguard.Hearthfire.Dragonborn.[/size][/color][color=#ff7700][size=4]Installation[/size][/color]:           


[size=3]Just download with Nexus mod manger, Mod organizer or manual,if you want to install it manually, 
[/size][size=3]                                then you have to extract it into your data file for Skyrim.


[/size][color=#ff7700][size=4]Unistallation[/size][/color]:       [size=3]Just untick in mod manger or mod organzier or delete the files you manually installed.
[/size][color=#00ff00][size=4]
